title: New O/L Revision Batch Starting February 2025
content: Registration is now open for the 2025 O/L Revision Programme. Limited seats available. Early bird discount of 10% until January 31st.

title: Class Cancellation - January 25th
content: Saturday classes on January 25th are cancelled due to a public holiday. Make-up class will be scheduled.

title: New Video Lessons Available
content: New video lessons on Chemical Reactions and Electricity are now available in the LMS.
